title: The Radiant Rekha Bangles
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) featuring Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones.
features: Modern Kada design featuring a sleek, open style. Accented with clusters of CZ stones set in a prong setting. The gold boasts a brilliant Hyderabadi luster.
colors: Warm gold with sparkling white CZ stones.
occasions: and modern celebrations. Makes a stylish addition to any outfit.
description: A contemporary twist on traditional Indian bangle designs. The radiant Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural beauty, while the CZ stones add a touch of affordable elegance. Versatile enough for both casual and semi-formal settings. A lightweight and comfortable everyday piece.
